name: Apple iPhone 17 Pro Max
highlights:
Released 2025, September 19
233g, 8.8mm thickness
iOS 26
256GB/512GB/2TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Ceramic Shield 2), aluminum alloy frame, aluminum alloy back/ glass back (Ceramic Shield)
BODY.SIM:
Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time; International)
eSIM + eSIM (8 or more, max 2 at a time; USA)
Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM (China)
BODY:
IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 6m for 30 min)
Apple Pay (Visa, MasterCard, AMEX certified)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000 nits (typ), 1600 nits (HBM), 3000 nits (peak)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
48 MP, f/1.6, 24mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, dual pixel PDAF, sensor-shift OIS
48 MP, f/2.8, 100mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.55", 0.7µm, PDAF, 3D sensor‑shift OIS, 4x optical zoom
48 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.55", 0.7µm, PDAF
TOF 3D LiDAR scanner (depth)
MAIN CAMERA.Video: 4K@24/25/30/60/100/120fps, 1080p@25/30/60/120/240fps, 10-bit HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 120fps), ProRes, ProRes RAW (up to 120fps), Apple Log 2, 3D (spatial) video/audio, stereo

SELFIE CAMERA.Single:
18 MP multi-aspect, f/1.9, (wide), PDAF, OIS
SL 3D, (depth/biometrics sensor)
SELFIE CAMERA.Features: HDR, Dolby Vision HDR, 3D (spatial) audio, stereo sound rec., ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2

COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS, QZSS, NavIC

FEATURES.Sensors: Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
FEATURES:
Ultra Wideband (UWB) support (gen2 chip)
Emergency SOS, Messages and Find My via satellite

BATTERY.Type:
Li-Ion 4832 mAh - Nano SIM model
Li-Ion 5088 mAh - eSIM only model
BATTERY.Charging:
Wired, PD3.2, AVS, 50% in 20 min
25W wireless MagSafe/Qi2, 50% in 30 min (15W - China)
4.5W reverse wired
